name: continuance afghan square
notes:
**grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry.**

the premium version includes a stitch diagram.

make the continuance afghan square with medium weight yarn and a 5.5 mm hook. this 12 x 12-inch square has a lovely texture that’s perfect for blankets, pillows, or afghans. you can keep it small or repeat the pattern to make it as big as you like. it looks great in any yarn—ombre, variegated, or solid! 

> this pattern is available for free on
> my website which is monetized by ads.
> if you prefer an ad-free version of
> the pattern it is available to
> purchase from my pattern shop.

the premium version includes a stitch diagram. 

bamcal december 2024 pattern.

♥ rhondda
